pages.title: Floppy Disks
pages.text: An alternative to playing MIDI files that are on your computer is to play MIDI files right from the web or MIDI files provided by the server.$(br2)The Floppy Disk allows you to create a disk with a URL to a MIDI file and play that file in a Transmitter or Broadcaster.

pages.title: Dyeing
pages.text: Floppy Disks can be dyed by combining the Floppy Disk with dye in a crafting table, just like leather armor.$(br2)The dye can be washed off by right clicking on a Cauldron full of water while holding the Floppy Disk.

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: Floppy Disks store 2 properties:$(br)$(li)$(l)Title$() - The title of the song that the Disk contains.$(br)$(li)$(l)URL$() - The URL to the MIDI File that the Disk should play. This can be a Web URL or a Server URL (more details in the Disk Writer section).
